FuncDef: This command configures the alternate destination IPv4 or IPv6 address to use for an IP tunnel. This destination address is used only if the primary destination configured with theremote-ipcommand is unreachable in the delivery service. Thesourceaddress,remote-ipaddress andbackup-remote-ipaddress of a tunnel must all belong to the same address family (IPv4 or IPv6). When the backup-remote-ip address contains an IPv6 address it must be a global unicast address.

ParaDef.Info: An IPv4 address or an IPv6 address.
